hint.primary: We revamped the internal data structure for v0.3.0+ chats to support features like multi-version chat messages. To make older chats appear in the app they need to be migrated to the new format.
hint.details: The migration process will NOT delete your old chats, but rather make a copy of them in the new format.
hint.footer: You can still access your old chats through older versions of LM Studio. Currently, images will not be migrated automatically.
